title: Summarises Package & Function Usage
text: usedthese family functions summarise R package & function usage Quarto documents consistent knitr’s syntax highlighting: used_here() adds nicely-rendered summary table usage single document; used_there() harvests tables created aggregate usage website ready analysis; used_elsewhere() harvests tables opted-websites enable analysis broader view usage [Planned]; used_where() finds pages website (opted-websites) use specified function [Planned].

title: Summarises Package & Function Usage
text: “little project” Quarto website quantumjitter.com focuses data science technique machine learning model analyse real-world data. foot quantified view R packages functions used associated code. achieved including used_here() Quarto document. used_there() harvests tables created used_here() enable Favourite Things article R packages functions used across website. personally find approach makes easier check consistency usage, acknowledge packages need keep abreast (go deeper ), spot opportunities updates latest greatest. Tidyverse blog announced changes dplyr purrr quick review Favourite Things identified number opportunities try exciting new features. example, dplyr introduced temporary grouping .argument mutate amigos. group_by() ungroup() used many times occurrences replaced new concise approach.

title: Summarise function usage here — used_here
text: Consistent knitr syntax highlighting, used_here() adds summary table R package & function usage knitted Quarto R Markdown document

title: Summarise function usage here — used_here
text: fil usage summary required document currently knitting current document, necessary specify argument need specified. want create summary running code chunk directly, necessary specify quoted name saved file. also case usage summary required , say, blog post summarising code file.

title: Summarise function usage here — used_here
text: rendered summary includes rows package name prefixed "DUPE", due conflict used_here() unable resolve, e.g. dplyr::first() versus xts::first(). cases, recommendation add "exclude = first" library call unwanted version.

title: Summarise function usage here — used_here
code: # Simple example -- see Get Started for an extended example mean(c(1, 2, 3)) #> [1] 2 sum(c(1, 2, 3)) #> [1] 6  # used_here() # Package Function # base    c[2];  mean[1];  sum[1]

title: Aggregate multi-table usage — used_there
text: Harvests aggregates function usage tables multiple pages website

title: Aggregate multi-table usage — used_there
text: url url website listing page posts containing usage tables created used_here()

title: Aggregate multi-table usage — used_there
code: # Uses a Quarto listing url to aggregate usage across website pages used_there("https://www.quantumjitter.com/project/") #> # A tibble: 1,244 × 4 #>    Package      Function   url                                                 n #>    <chr>        <chr>      <chr>                                           <int> #>  1 DT           datatable  https://www.quantumjitter.com/project/planning/     1 #>  2 R.utils      gunzip     https://www.quantumjitter.com/project/stories/      1 #>  3 RColorBrewer brewer.pal https://www.quantumjitter.com/project/bands/        1 #>  4 SPARQL       SPARQL     https://www.quantumjitter.com/project/bands/        1 #>  5 SPARQL       SPARQL     https://www.quantumjitter.com/project/planning/     1 #>  6 SPARQL       SPARQL     https://www.quantumjitter.com/project/sw10/         1 #>  7 base         abbreviate https://www.quantumjitter.com/project/sets/         1 #>  8 base         as.Date    https://www.quantumjitter.com/project/deal/         2 #>  9 base         as.Date    https://www.quantumjitter.com/project/jitter/       1 #> 10 base         as.Date    https://www.quantumjitter.com/project/sw10/         1 #> # … with 1,234 more rows
